definitions.definition: Anything having substance; an essential part.
Not imaginary; real; actual; true; veritable.
Having good substance; strong; stout; solid; firm.
Possessed of goods or an estate; moderately wealthy.
Large in size, quantity, or value; ample; significant.
definitions.example: A substantial number of people went to the event.

definitions.definition: Satisfying; having sufficient substance to be nourishing or filling.
definitions.example: I don't just want a snack; I need something substantial.
